info.description: This is the API documentation for the Parodos Workflow Service. It provides operations to execute assessments to determine infrastructure options (tooling + environments). Also executes infrastructure task workflows to call downstream systems to stand-up an infrastructure option.
info.title: Parodos Workflow Service API

get.summary: Returns status about a specified project access request

post.summary: Update status of a specified project access request

get.summary: Returns information about a specified project
Returns a list of workflow definition
Returns information about a workflow definition by id

parameters.description: valueProvider Name. It can be referenced to 'valueProviderName' in [GET /getWorkFlowDefinitions](#/Workflow%20Definition/getWorkFlowDefinitions)
parameters.name: valueProviderName

post.summary: Updates a workflow checker task status
Restart a workflow execution with same parameters
